trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Winter Haven
There was one other sighting in Winter Haven on or around February 9th 2000
divs: Sighting Details After shopping at Publix witness and son spotted a light similar to lights theyhad seen two nights before (Feb. 7th, 2000 - see #1-266) and video taped. Itappeared to be at same location. Witness attempted to drive in direction of thelight to discover source, traveling eastward approx. two miles. The lighthovered in one position for about 15-20 minutes. It seemed as though they werecloser. It appeared to be a white light with an orange glow around it. Anotherlight appeared near it for 3 min. and then disappeared, then the first lightdisappeared, never to be seen again.
